Package com.elderbyte.security.spring.local.auth

Class AuthenticationDetailImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elderbyte.security.spring.local.auth.AuthenticationDetailImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationDetail, java.io.Serializable, java.security.Principal, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication
    public class AuthenticationDetailImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationDetail
    Represents the details of an authenticated user. Immutable implementation
    See Also:

        Creates a new AuthenticationDetail
        Parameters:
        realm - The security realm / tenant
        username - The user name
        subject - The unique user id
        fullName - A user friendly display string
        authorities - The security roles
        details - Additional, untyped details

      • getSubject

        public java.lang.String getSubject()
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationDetail
        Gets the user identity, which must be unique in the current environment, even over multiple realms. It can be an internal id, uuid, or a natural id like email etc. This is a short-hand for the generic getPrincipal()
        Specified by:
        getSubject in interface AuthenticationDetail

        public java.lang.Object getDetails()
